contentrichtext.text: <!-- This article was auto-generated by [[User:Polbot]]. --> {{taxobox |name = ''Xanthophyllum sulphureum'' |status = VU |status_system = IUCN2.3 |regnum = [[Plant]]ae |unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperms]] |unranked_classis = [[Eudicots]] |unranked_ordo = [[Rosids]] |ordo = [[Fabales]] |familia = [[Polygalaceae]] |genus = ''[[Xanthophyllum]]'' |species = '''''X. sulphureum''''' |binomial = ''Xanthophyllum sulphureum'' |binomial_authority = [[George King (botanist)|King]] |}} '''''Xanthophyllum sulphureum''''' is a species of [[plant]] in the [[Polygalaceae]] family. It is [[Endemism|endemic]] to [[Malaysia]]. It is threatened by [[habitat loss]]. ==Source== * Chua, L.S.L. 1998. [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/36392/all ''Xanthophyllum sulphureum'']. [http://www.iucnredlist.org 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. ] Downloaded on 24 August 2007. [[Category:Flora of Malaysia]] [[Category:Xanthophyllum|sulphureum]] [[Category:Vulnerable plants]] {{rosid-stub}}
